author: Shoshy Ciment
title: Gap is using its factories to make masks, gowns, and scrubs for healthcare workers
description: Gap will use its factory resources to make personal protective equipment for healthcare workers. The retailer announced via Twitter that it would "pivot resources so factory partners can make masks, gowns & scrubs for healthcare workers on the front lines." G…
content:
Gap is the latest retailer to announce a commitment to use its resources to create personal protective equipment like masks and scrubs for healthcare workers.
The company announced on Wednesday via Twitter that it would "pivot resources so factory partners c… [+873 chars]
